cs35013s.view

Class WindowManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs35013s.view.WindowManager

  • public class WindowManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines a manager that maintains all windows, which are simultaneous views of the model.
    Author:
    Dan Tappan [01.04.13]
